trans:
so it's weekend already, after finishing the promotion for the new song: "wish you back",  he will have the whole 3 days to take a rest. [redacted_name]g picks up the phone again, looking at the words "my baby ğŸ’•ğŸ¦™" for a while. damn it, recovering data from a phone crushed by nearly a ton of weight was a series of difficulties that jisung didn't wish to go through again.
and yet, that person did not even bother to listen? or make a phone call to him? this face has even appeared on TV for the previous 2 years without any actions?
letting out another sigh, j[redacted_name] surfs the social media. reading the most recent article, he gently smiles, his face lights up slightly as he read the comments of his fans, or people who simply love han's music. then his eyes stop at an advertisement section
